name: Ghost World (allcrazyman101)
description:
You are a ghost inside a doll trapped inside a mysterious manor. Escape so that you may go out and see the world! CONTROLS: -WASD to move -E to enter and exit the doll -Left click to pickup and drop boxes -Hold Shift to Sprint -You can enter the doll when you are looking at the doll or when you are near the doll

BadgerDroll  - Modeller

BgAlex - Modeller

Allcrazyman101 - Programmer
